titleStmt.title: England's appeal, to her high court of Parliament; against Irish and Scottish evidence

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing; date in Wing = [1695].
An appeal to Parliament to make perjury in treason trials a capital offense, with particular reference to victims of the Popish Plot tried before 1682, but no mention of the Rye House Plot of 1683.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
